actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to designate the Skyline National Parkway in the State of California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to designate the Skyline National Parkway in the State of California. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to designate the Skyline National Parkway in the State of California, and for other purposes.
